verses.text: So he went and took Gomer, daughter of Diblaim, and she conceived and bore him a son.Again the Lord said to him,

verses.text: Then she conceived again and bore a daughter. So God said to him,

verses.text: Now after she weaned Lo-Ruhamah, she conceived again and bore a son.So the Lord said,
parts: Now after she weaned Lo-Ruhamah, she conceived again and bore a son.So the Lord said,

verses.text: So I bought her for myself for fifteen pieces of silver, a homer of barley, and a jar of wine.
parts: So I bought her for myself for fifteen pieces of silver, a homer of barley, and a jar of wine.

verses.text: I said to her, “You shall stay with me for many days.
parts: I said to her, “You shall stay with me for many days.

verses.text: For the children of Israel shall abide many days without a king, without a prince, without a sacrifice, without an altar, without a priesthood, and without symbols of revelation.
parts: For the children of Israel shall abide many days without a king, without a prince, without a sacrifice, without an altar, without a priesthood, and without symbols of revelation.

verses.text: Afterward the children of Israel shall return and seek the Lord their God and David their king; and they shall be amazed at the Lord and at His good things in the latter days.
parts: Afterward the children of Israel shall return and seek the Lord their God and David their king; and they shall be amazed at the Lord and at His good things in the latter days.
